item.text: @#/ /'bum nga pa bzhugs so//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po don dgu
pa| /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ gzugs
kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni nam mkha' dang
mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar dper
na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang
chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni nam
mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod
do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe
dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni nam mkha' dang mnyam
pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus
mi dmigs so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang
yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs
te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ltan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha'
mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed
kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang
mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu
mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi
dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par
shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ mig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i bya phyir
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes
ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig gi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa
nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ rna ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam
mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod
do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la
mtha'am dbus mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par

mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de

gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam grangs des na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang
ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med/ byang chub sems
dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems
dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
sa'i khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs
so/ /chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chu'i khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
des na chu'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la me'i
khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na me'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi
dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rlung gi khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rlung gi khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nam mkha'i khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na nam mkha'i khams byang chub sems dpa'
zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa'i
khams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med
cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma rig pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ma rig pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du byed med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa med/
byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /
ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ming dang gzugs med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam grangs des na ming dang gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
stong pa nyid la skye mched drug med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na skye mched drug byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la reg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
rnam grangs des na reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshor ba med/
byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sred pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sred pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing
mi dmigs so/ /len pa ni len pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la len pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na len pa
byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la srid pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe
dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na srid pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na skye ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rga shi ni rga
shis steng ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rga shi med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rga shi byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid
la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa
nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /phyir stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid med/

byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /stong pa

nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa
nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus
byas stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa
nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das
pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
rang bzhin stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos thams
cad stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyi stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid
stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa
nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa

nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa'

med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/
byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid
la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
yang dag par spong ba rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dbang po rnams med/ byang chub sems
dpa' med do/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stobs rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ byang chub sems
dpa' med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/ byang chub sems
dpa' med do/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshad med pa
rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshad med pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa'
med do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa brgyad med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
smon pa med pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/
/mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mngon par shes pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /ting nge 'dzin
rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams
kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs
pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mi 'jigs pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /snying rje chen po ni snying
rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la snying rje chen po med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis
stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de
bzhin nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yang dag pa'i mtha' med/ byang chub sems
dpa' med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med/ byang
chub sems dpa' med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa'
med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /
nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs
rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos med/ byang
chub sems dpa' med do/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs
so/ /'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par
shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad smras zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs
so/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes
ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du
byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes
dang 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la med
cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba dang
sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig dang rna ba dang sna dang

dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so// //shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po gya gcig pa/ /sa'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams
ni chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
me'i khams ni me'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i
khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i
khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nam mkha'i
khams ni nam mkha'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la med cing mi dmigs
so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i
khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i
khams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa ni 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed ni 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
'du byed ni ma rig pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs
so/ /rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ming
dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ming dang gzugs ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du
byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye mched drug ni skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye mched drug ni ma rig pa
dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang
gzugs dang / skye mched drug ni reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg pa ni reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa ni
tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye
mched drug dang / reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor
ba ni sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sred pa ni sred pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sred pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang /
skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang /

ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba ni rga shi la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rga shi ni rga shi la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rga shi ni ma rig pa dang /

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshul

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la med

cing mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid ni

phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi

dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyi stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la med cing

mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa

nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa

nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa

nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /

stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong
pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid
dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma
byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma

med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang

stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med

pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la med cing

mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid
la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /
phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang /
phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ chos thams cad
stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid
dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma

byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang

stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas

stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa

nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la

med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa

stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang

stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa

stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /

don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong

pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang /

phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang

gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
dang / dor ba med pa stang pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa

stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa
nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs

so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang

bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med
cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dbang po rnams ni dran
pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams ni stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /
yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
dbang po dang / stobs rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar
bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam ni lam la
med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
bsam gtan rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs
so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar
pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam
par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni
mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan
dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon
par shes pa rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden
pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / /bsam
gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon
par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi
'jigs pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byams pa chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med
cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so/ /snying rje
chen po ni snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs so/snying rje chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po la
med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la med cing mi dmigs
so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /brgyad pa'i chos
rnams ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams
ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos
rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i
chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni phyir
mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams
ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni rigs
kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i

sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /brgyad
pa'i sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /brgyad pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang /

brgyad pa'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mthong ba'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mthong ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /bsrabs pa'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /

bsrabs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong
ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'dod

chags dang bral ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad
pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa
la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral
ba'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral
ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi
sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la med
cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs
pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa' sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang
chub sems dpa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs
pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs
pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la
med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i
sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thams
cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam
pa shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med
cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs
pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ni dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa ni dgra
bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir ma 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa ni rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas
ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig
phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la
med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas la med cing mi
dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs
pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba
dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la med
cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med
cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing
rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni byang chub
sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chos thams cad med cing dmigs su med pas/ byang chub sems
dpa' med cing dmigs su med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam yin zhes zer ba ni/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya
ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/
de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de ni 'du shes ma yin/ de ni 'du byed ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang
bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
'di lta ste/ mig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya ba dang / lus zhes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di
ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin/ de ni rna ba ma yin/ de ni sna ma yin/ de ni
lce ma yin/ de ni lus ma yin/ de ni yid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir
'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes
bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / chos zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang
du'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ de ni sgra ma yin/ de ni dri ma yin/ de ni ro ma yin/ de ni reg ma yin/ de ni chos ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe
dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / lce'i rnam par
shes pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi
'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i
rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan
pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lce'i
'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi
'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i
'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming
ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ da ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba dang / chu'i khams zhes bya ba dang / me'i khams zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi khams zhes bya ba dang / nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba dang /
rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba
gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin/ de ni chu'i khams ma yin/ de ni me'i khams ma yin/ de ni rlung gi khams ma yin/ de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i
khams ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang
chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
zhes bya ba dang / ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba dang / skye mched drug ces bya ba dang / reg pa zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dang / len pa zhes bya ba dang /
srid pa zhes bya ba dang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang na'ang mi
gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ de ni 'du byad ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin/ de ni skye mched drug
ma yin/ de ni reg pa ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sred pa ma yin/ de ni len pa ma yin/ de ni srid pa ma yin/ de ni skye ba ma yin/ de ni rga shi ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang
ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir
'di lta lte/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/ bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir
'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
med/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam
ste/ ming la'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan
gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa
dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ nang
stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang nang stong pa nyid med/ nang stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin
pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang phyi stong

pa nyid med/ phyi stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ /de'i phyir 'di lta ste/

byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /

'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa
dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ chen po stong pa

nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang chen po stong pa nyid med/ chen po stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni ming
tsam ste/ ming la'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid med/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang
'dus byas stong pa nyid med/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing
mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa
nyid med/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs
te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid med/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi

dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang thog ma dang tha ma med

pa stong pa nyid med/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis
